subject: Climate & Environment
title: Green Hydrogen
description: A short lesson to help you apply Green Hydrogen.

hook.text: Hydrogen is the most abundant element in the universe. It burns clean â€” just water vapor.

buildup.text: Electrolyzers split water into hydrogen and oxygen using electricity.

discovery.text: When that electricity comes from renewables, the hydrogen is completely carbon-free.

twist.text: Right now 96% of hydrogen is made from fossil fuels. Truly green hydrogen barely exists.

climax.text: Costs are dropping fast. Green hydrogen could decarbonize steel, shipping, and aviation.

punchline.text: The cleanest fuel is water, split apart and put back together.
